casebody.data:
HAMBY
v.
PROFILE PRODUCTS, et al. No. 507-A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 5, 2006. Joseph W. Moss, Charlotte, Sarah L. Buthe, Raleigh, for Profile Products. G. Chrisopher Olson, Raleigh, for Hamby. Gregory C. York, Charlotte, for Electric Service Group, Inc.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 4th day of December 2006 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (Profile Products) shall have up to and including the 17th day of January 2007 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 5th day of December 2006."
